about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Scamster Kombat — an exciting clicker where every mouse click brings you closer to your cherished goal! In this game you have to take on the role of a funny guy who hides under a blanket and earns coins by tapping on the screen. But be careful! Your quiet life can be disrupted by uninvited guests!

Gameplay:

Clicks for coins: Each click of your mouse brings you coins. The faster you click, the more coins you collect. Increase your income by improving your skills and opening up new opportunities!
Unexpected guests: Your cozy atmosphere may be disrupted by various characters who enter the room. They can distract you from collecting coins, and you will need to react quickly!
Drive away uninvited guests: Use the WASD keys to drive away those who interfere with your peace of mind. Fast reaction and accuracy are the key to success! Every time you successfully get rid of unwanted visitors, you will be able to return to collecting coins.

Game Features:

Bright and colorful graphics: Immerse yourself in the cute and funny world of hamsters with vivid illustrations and animations.
Funny Characters: Meet unique guests with different characters and behaviors. Each of them adds its own flavor to the gameplay.
Unpredictable gameplay: Every time you play, your meetings with the guests will be unique. Be prepared for unexpected turns!

Conclusion

Scamster Kombat is not just a clicker, it's a fun adventure that will make you laugh and keep you on your toes! Become a master of clicks, chase away uninvited guests and become the real king of hamsters! Are you ready to start your journey? Join us and start earning coins right now!

content_descriptors.notes:
in the game "Scamster Kombat" the main character walks around with a naked torso.
in the game "Scamster Kombat" the main character masturbates under the blanket. The genitals are not visible. Masturbation is an imitation of pressing a button on the screen.

  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Sound Card: integrated
